articles.title: Wiegman had ‘hard conversations’ before dropping Euro 2022 trio - The Guardian
articles.description: Beth England, Nikita Parris and Lotte Wubben-Moy have been left out of the Lionesses squad to play USA on 7 October then Czech Republic
